review.title: “Convenient”
review.pros: Pros – As a contract therapist, you are in control of scheduling. You determine which locations (neighborhood) you will service as well.
review.cons: Cons – Half of the case managers have a good head on their shoulders and are really committed to what they do. The other half are just paper pushers. It's about the bottom line for management
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
